text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum bellum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Montúfar, R. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Solanum bellum". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46323A11048684. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46323A11048684.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
